turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Head down to the Starbucks, i'd like to order something from there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like a Grande ice pumpkin spice latte and a Grande ice cordusio.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where do you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There should be one down on Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: grande iced pumpkin spice latte with 2% milk and whipped cream and a grande iced cordusio with whole milk, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on main street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. I'll head on down.
